title: Estefan
long_description:
Estefan is the world’s greatest hair dresser. Can he successfully meet his latest challenge or will he fail? The frustration mounts with each attempt to please his client.

- 2012 Siggraph Computer Animation Festival – Best Student Project
- 2013 College Television Awards (Student Emmys) – 1st Place Animation
- 2013 Houston World Fest – Platinum Remi Winner
description: Estefan is the world’s greatest hair dresser. Can he successfully meet his latest challenge or will he fail? The frustration mounts with each attempt to please his client.
